channel.title: Devo 7
channel.description:
So I'm using devolution as a base (Making a 3.0 remake kind of)
Now i need help with the premium system read a few threads about it and people say rights=4 is premium but rights=4 is a hidden admin and they get access to ::mute, ::tbad and all them commands.
and premium = 2 or premium = 1 doesn't work either ;/ anyone know how to fix this?
Unless anyone know how to make it
Rights=0 ( Normal member ) Rights=1 (Premium member / Removes silver crown for rights=1) Rights=2 (Mod with silver crown) Rights=3 (Admin, gold crown blahblah)

item.title: Devo 7
item.dc:creator: @killer-bros-owner Shane95
item.description:
@killer-bros-owner wrote:

Thanks, I’ll try that out now.

Read full topic

item.title: Devo 7
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

the problem is simply your commands.

your commands are probly wrote like this

if(command.equalsIgnorecase(“blah blah”) && p.rights >= 2){}

when they should just be used like

if(command.equalsIgnorecase(“blah blah”) && p.rights == 2){}

that way u can use the 4th right.

Read full topic

Rights=1 (Premium member / Removes silver crown for rights=1)
